ComicInfo.Summary: Transference: Concerned with her progressing pregnancy, Sara decides to give up the Witchblade. Fate brings her to the curio shop where Danielle has also found herself mysteriously drawn. Under the watchful eyes of the Curator and Gleason, Sara transfers the Witchblade to a new bearer.

ComicInfo.Title: Transference
